name: BitzGames Presents - Kappi - For Game Boy
name_original: BitzGames Presents - Kappi - For Game Boy
description:
BitzGames Presents - Kappi - A Monochrome Maze game (In Development) for Game Boy! Kappi has dropped her Rice Treats down a rabbit hole and ends up in Monochrome Maze Madness! Without any hesitation, she SHOVES the first Dugg in her path away, only to discover a maze of puzzles and tricks! She must use her wits to recover the snacks and win the day! Push Duggs, Find Keys, Activate Switches and Open Doors! All in good fun! And remember - Snack time is ALWAYS around the corner, you just have to find it!

Proudly made with GB Studio!

Plus, a huge thanks to these lovely people -

kai musick aka devetite - https://kai-dev.itch.io/ - Kappi Sprite

OTHER LOVELY PEOPLE TBD
